title: Need help with leaverbuster. (Please Staff look at this)
body:
I was in a game, when i started to take blue camp (top). My League was lagging really hard even tho i had 15 ping.
The lagg continued and then my league crashed in an instant. Tried to reconnect but League of Legends didn't show the reconnect button.
When i tried to start a game it said i was already in a game but i could acces shop etc. I tried to get in the game as fast as possible that's why i couldnt make any screenshots.

Now i have 5 leaverbusters. Can they be removed? if not i guess i have to play them all. But i would really appreciate it if Riot can do something about it.

I hope to see a answer as soon as possible.

Thank you for your time. <3

All the best,

Mike

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some connection problems reaching our game servers, and even with a solid ping you can suffer from factors like packet loss.  You should run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your specific case.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty only occurs after multiple leaves and regardless of intent, because leaving still causes a negative experience for other players.  Meaning, the only way to remove it is by continuing to play without leaving.  Let me know if that clears things up!
